00064 /**
00065  * \addtogroup  Library

00079 /** 
00080  * \ingroup PrivateLibrary
00081  * \brief Global variable for initialization state of the library.
00082  *
00083  * \description
00084  *
00085  *   1 = initialized, 0 = not initialized.
00086  */
00087 static int library_init = 0;
00088 
00089 /**
00090  * \ingroup PrivateLibrary
00091  * \brief  Global variable for Verbosity level of the library.    
00092  */
00093 static FC_VerbosityLevel library_verbosity = FC_QUIET;
00094 
00095 /** \name Set and query the library verbosity level. */
00096 //-------------------------------
00097 //@{
00098 
00099 /** 
00100  * \ingroup Library
00101  * \brief Set the library verbosity level.
00102  *
00103  * \description
00104  * 
00105  *    See \ref FC_VerbosityLevel for explanation of possible settings.
00106  *
00107  * \modifications
00108  *    - 3/12/04 RM created.
00109  */
00110 FC_ReturnCode fc_setLibraryVerbosity( 
00111  FC_VerbosityLevel verbosity   /**< input - desire verbosity */
00112 )
00113 {
00114   int flag;
00115 
00116   // test args
00117   flag = fc_isVerbosityLevelValid(verbosity);
00118   if (flag < 1) {
00119     fc_printfWarningMessage("Invalid verbosity level (%d)", verbosity);
00120     return FC_INPUT_ERROR;
00121   }
00122 
00123   // do it
00124   fc_printfLogMessage("Setting library verbosity to %s",
00125                 fc_getVerbosityLevelText(verbosity)); 
00126   library_verbosity = verbosity;
00127 
00128   return FC_SUCCESS;
00129 }
00130 
00131 /** 
00132  * \ingroup Library
00133  * \brief Get the current verbosity level of the library.
00134  *
00135  * \description
00136  * 
00137  *    See \ref FC_VerbosityLevel for explanation of possible settings.
00138  *
00139  * \modifications
00140  *   -  3/12/04 RM created.
00141  */
00142 FC_VerbosityLevel fc_getLibraryVerbosity(void) 
00143 {
00144   return  library_verbosity;
00145 }
00146 
00147 //@}
00148  
00149 /** \name Initialize/finalize the library. */
00150 //-------------------------------
00151 //@{
00152 
00153 /**
00154  * \ingroup  Library
00155  * \brief  Setup Feature Characterization Library for use.
00156  *
00157  * \description  
00158  *
00159  *    Executes library initialization.  Must be called before using any
00160  *    functions except for fc_getLibraryVerbosity and fc_setLibraryVerbosity
00161  *    (\ref fc_setLibraryVerbosity should be called before \ref
00162  *    fc_initLibrary() if you want any to insure that anything setup by the
00163  *    library (e.g.  the SAF i/o libraries) are initialized with your requested
00164  *    verbosity level).
00165  *
00166  *    Calling fc_initLibrary() more than once is an error.
00167  *
00168  * \modifications  
00169  *    - Nancy Collins, Created.
00170  *    - 06/03/04 WSK, modified to insure that library cannot be reinited.
00171  */
00172 FC_ReturnCode fc_initLibrary(void) 
00173 {
00174   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00175   static int been_here = 0;
00176   
00177   // reiniting library is an error
00178   if (been_here) {
00179     if (library_init) {
00180       fc_printfErrorMessage("Library already initialized");
00181     }
00182     else 
00183       fc_printfErrorMessage("Library cannot be reinitialized once finalized");
00184     return FC_ERROR;
00185   }
00186 
00187   // init the library
00188   fc_printfLogMessage("Initializing FC Library");
00189 
00190   // init IO
00191   rc = _fc_initFileIO();
00192   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) {
00193     fc_printfErrorMessage("Failed to initialize File IO");
00194     return rc;
00195   }
00196   
00197   library_init = 1;
00198   been_here = 1;
00199 
00200   return FC_SUCCESS;
00201 }
00202 
00203 /**
00204  * \ingroup  Library
00205  * \brief   Cleanup when done using Feature Characterization Library.
00206  *
00207  * \description
00208  *  
00209  *    Executes library finalization.  Should be called after
00210  *    last access to library. Will delete all datasets.
00211  *
00212  *    It is not an error to final an uninitialized library, but you
00213  *    can not reinitialize a finalized library.
00214  *
00215  * \modifications  
00216  *    - Nancy Collins, Created.
00217  *    - 12/08/03 WSK Made sure it deletes databases and frees
00218  *            all of the tables.
00219  */
00220 FC_ReturnCode fc_finalLibrary( 
00221  void
00222 ) {
00223   int i;
00224   FC_ReturnCode rc, rc_keep;
00225   _FC_DsSlot* dsSlot;
00226   FC_Dataset dataset;
00227   char* temp_name;
00228 
00229   // finalizing uninitialized library does not generate an error
00230   if (library_init == 0) {
00231     fc_printfWarningMessage("Library already finalized");
00232     return FC_SUCCESS;
00233   }
00234   
00235   // log message
00236   fc_printfLogMessage("Finalizing FC Library");
00237 
00238   // delete all datasets
00239   rc_keep = FC_SUCCESS;
00240   for (i = 0; i < _fc_getDsTableSize(); i++) {
00241     dsSlot = _fc_getDsSlotFromID(i);
00242     if (dsSlot) {
00243       _FC_GET_HANDLE(dataset, dsSlot);
00244       fc_getDatasetName(dataset, &temp_name);
00245       rc = fc_deleteDataset(dataset);
00246       if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) {
00247         rc_keep = rc;
00248         fc_printfWarningMessage("Failed to delete dataset '%s'", temp_name);
00249       }
00250       free(temp_name);
00251     }
00252   }
00253 
00254   // free tables
00255   _fc_freeDsTable();
00256   _fc_freeSeqTable();
00257   _fc_freeMeshTable();
00258   _fc_freeSubTable();
00259   _fc_freeVarTable();
00260 
00261   // finalize file IO
00262   rc = _fc_finalFileIO();
00263   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) 
00264     fc_printfWarningMessage("Failed to finalize FileIO");
00265   
00266   // library is considered finalized even if error generated
00267   library_init = 0;
00268 
00269   // if any errors, make sure you return one of them
00270   if (rc == FC_SUCCESS)
00271     return rc_keep;
00272   else
00273     return rc;
00274 }
00275 
00276 //@}
00277 
00278 /**
00279  * \ingroup  PrivateLibrary
00280  * \brief  Check initialization state of library.
00281  *
00282  * \description
00283  *  
00284  *    Returns true (1) is library is available for use.
00285  *
00286  * \modifications  
00287  *   - 05/20/04  W Koegler  Created.
00288  */
00289 int _fc_isLibraryInit(void) 
00290 {
00291   return library_init;
00292 }
